meanings.def: the unit of money of some countries of the European Union
examples: I paid five euros for it.
in euros The price is given in euros.
A half-kilo pack of pasta costs around 70 euro cents.

meanings.def: euros as as a system of money; the value of the euro compared with the value of the money of other countries
examples: What if the UK had joined the Euro in 1999?
the value of the euro against the dollar

meanings.def: (used especially in newspapers) connected with Europe, especially the European Union
examples: His speech in the Euro debate was hardly stunning.

meanings.def: connected with Europe or the European Union
